summary: Completed comprehensive testing of mobile responsive features, department CRUD, week archive, and WebSocket status indicator. All 11 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI testing verified all new features working correctly on both desktop (1920x1080) and mobile (375x667) viewports.
critical_code_review_comments: WebSocket shows 'Offline' status - this is expected behavior when WebSocket server is not actively connected. The indicator correctly shows connection state.
Mobile responsiveness is well implemented with proper breakpoints (lg:) for sidebar collapse/expand
seed_data_creation: Test departments created with TEST_ prefix during testing were cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: All mobile responsive features tested and working. Sidebar collapses on mobile with hamburger menu. FactionPage has create/delete department functionality with confirmation dialog. WeekArchivePage shows all weeks for a department. WebSocket status indicator (Live/Offline badge) is present on DepartmentPage. Admin panel is fully responsive.
